subject: Re: [junit] HTML/XHTML Validation w/JUnit
msgSnippet: ... Interesting. I wonder what it does that XMLUnit and HtmlUnit don t do. ... Neat. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software Services
messageBody:
Ilja Preuss wrote:

> J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>
> > There's probably no project that has extracted this for reuse, because
> > there's almost nothing to it.
>
> Actually Johannes Link is working on XHTMLUnit which does this (and
> more, of course). Hopefully it will appear on Source Forge soon.

Interesting. I wonder what it does that XMLUnit and HtmlUnit don't do.

> I am also working on including basic tests for HTML 4 compatibility.

Neat.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
